Package controller

Class SeatingLayoutController

java.lang.Object
controller.SeatingLayoutController
public class SeatingLayoutController extends Object
This class represents the Controller for SeatingLayout It handles all database functions related to SeatingLayout database file

    Description

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    createSeatingLayoutWithShowTimeId(int showTimeId, ArrayList<String> seatLayout)
    CREATE a SeatingLayout with that corresponding CinemaShowTime Is called when creating a new CinemaShowTime and copying the contents of that static Cinema text file into the showtime seatinglayout folder
    static void
    deleteSeatingLayoutByShowTimeId(int showTimeId)
    DELETE a SeatingLayout with that corresponding CinemaShowTime
    static SeatingLayout
    getSeatingLayoutByCinemaCode(String cinemaCode)
    READ all the SeatingLayout in the Database file directory of Cinema This represents the static layout which won't be changed of that specific Cinema e.g Cinema Code is AAA, Filename in that directory is seatinglayout_AAA.txt
    static SeatingLayout
    getSeatingLayoutByShowTimeId(int showTimeId)
    READ all the SeatingLayout in the Database file directory of CinemaShowTime This represents the dynamic layout which will be changed if MovieGoer book a seat e.g CinemaShowTime Id is 11, Filename in that directory is seatinglayout_11.txt
    static void
    updateSeatingLayoutByShowTimeId(int showTimeId, ArrayList<String> seatLayout)
    UPDATE a SeatingLayout with that corresponding CinemaShowTime Get the Array of String seat layout from Model.entity.SeatingLayout -> outputToFile

  • Constructor Details

    • SeatingLayoutController

      public SeatingLayoutController()

  • Method Details

    • getSeatingLayoutByCinemaCode

      public static SeatingLayout getSeatingLayoutByCinemaCode(String cinemaCode)
      READ all the SeatingLayout in the Database file directory of Cinema This represents the static layout which won't be changed of that specific Cinema e.g Cinema Code is AAA, Filename in that directory is seatinglayout_AAA.txt
      Parameters:
      cinemaCode - SeatLayout which belongs the Cinema
      Returns:
      SeatingLayout by that CinemaCode

    • getSeatingLayoutByShowTimeId

      public static SeatingLayout getSeatingLayoutByShowTimeId(int showTimeId)
      READ all the SeatingLayout in the Database file directory of CinemaShowTime This represents the dynamic layout which will be changed if MovieGoer book a seat e.g CinemaShowTime Id is 11, Filename in that directory is seatinglayout_11.txt
      Parameters:
      showTimeId - SeatLayout which belongs the CinemaShowTime
      Returns:
      SeatingLayout by that CinemaShowTime

    • createSeatingLayoutWithShowTimeId

      public static void createSeatingLayoutWithShowTimeId(int showTimeId, ArrayList<String> seatLayout)
      CREATE a SeatingLayout with that corresponding CinemaShowTime Is called when creating a new CinemaShowTime and copying the contents of that static Cinema text file into the showtime seatinglayout folder
      Parameters:
      showTimeId - CinemaShowTime that SeatingLayout belongs to
      seatLayout - An array of string to be output to text file

    • deleteSeatingLayoutByShowTimeId

      public static void deleteSeatingLayoutByShowTimeId(int showTimeId)
      DELETE a SeatingLayout with that corresponding CinemaShowTime
      Parameters:
      showTimeId - CinemaShowTime which the SeatingLayout belong to

    • updateSeatingLayoutByShowTimeId

      public static void updateSeatingLayoutByShowTimeId(int showTimeId, ArrayList<String> seatLayout)
      UPDATE a SeatingLayout with that corresponding CinemaShowTime Get the Array of String seat layout from Model.entity.SeatingLayout -> outputToFile
      Parameters:
      showTimeId - CinemaShowTime which the SeatingLayout belong to
      seatLayout - Updated Seating Layout in array of strings
